content.content: An Emergency Executive has been voted to the voting portal - Maker Governance - Proposal Emergency Parameter Changes - March 11, 2023 Please review the contents and consider voting if you support the changes. Further information may be found in the forum thread here - Emergency Proposal: Risk and Governance Parameter Changes (11 March 2023) Please direct any comments or feedback to the original thread to keep this announcement thread clean and tidy.
content.GPT-summary: The post announces the Emergency Executive proposal for Maker Governance and provides a link to the forum thread for further information. The author requests feedback and encourages readers to vote if they support the changes. The post also asks readers to direct any comments or feedback to the original thread to keep the announcement thread clean and tidy.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
